title: OmkAramAna poruLE ulagamellAm
sahitya:
OmkAramAna poruLE ulagamellAm ulAvi viLaiyADum aruLE parabrahmamE


anupallavi

  nIngA tuyirkkuyirAi nirainda jIva sAkSiyE nIla vAn shuDar pOlE nilavum tiruk-kATSiyE


caraNam    aLLa aLLak-kuraiyA amudak-kaDal virivE anbaruL uNarvAgum Ananda arivE
uLLapaDi irundE oru kOTit-tozhil sheyyum oppuyarvillAda arputamE sharaN
